ygData.subject: Re: Trains on purpose was My Mistmoore Experience
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant frowns on this tactic - if you have good reason to believe these trains are being pulled on purpose /petition.  The problem with this of course - is
ygData.messageBody:
Verant frowns on this tactic - if you have good reason to believe these
trains are being pulled on purpose /petition. The problem with this of
course - is that it's very hard to prove...

Slide
----- Original Message -----
From: Bard <dabard@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, September 12, 1999 3:36 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] My Mistmoore Experience


> From: "Bard" <dabard@...>
>
> A high-level mage in my guild told me that (at least on The Rathe)
sometimes
> high-level folks inside the castle start trains on purpose to get rid of
all
> the folks outside (and to reduce lag I guess). Looks like it'll be a
> helluva long time before I go there then :o)~
>
> -=B=-
> Safe, happy, and 23rd in the Plains of Karana
>
